name: Final Stage
description:
Hey! We are *Insert a cool team name that we haven't decided*. This one is our first game developed together with a lot of tears and a little bit of blood - but you can ignore that... I guess. It was made for a Jam with a topic that will make you feel nostalgic: Classic Arcade Games.Our first naive thought was "How difficult would it be?", and when we were without any ideas we realized "Oh no". After a lot of thinking, the solution popped up and Frogger was its name.

Under the same scheme of avoiding objects, Final Stage is the previous scene to the final battle of a RPG game. Devon is alone with almost no magic left, and the security in the castle has been increased: they are looking for him. Devon's invisibility charm is weak and it will only resist two crashes before being caught. He needs to move quickly or more bodyguards are going to appear. Tired after killing two Magic Lords, there is one left that he has to destroy in order to achieve his objective: to be the Dark Lord of the Realm

Help him to win the game, and be the villain of a story in which good doesn't prevail over evil.

SFX soon (((maybe))).

Levels soon.

Battle Scenes not soon but in the future.
